text: [Year 1279 AN] [Shadow Realm Research Center]

speaker: left
text: Scien!

speaker: right
text: Yes?

speaker: left
text: Has the second protype awakened it's Xuir Arts yet?

speaker: right
text: Not yet, sir.

speaker: left
text: Then it's likely another failure.

speaker: left
text: Prepare the new extraction room, I might as well get some life energy from this.

speaker: left
text: And who knows, the torture might awaken one of it's arts.

speaker: right
text: Sir...

speaker: right
text: Sir... I will not.

speaker: left
text: You dare defy my orders?

speaker: right
text: I've worked at this research center for the past seven years, but I can no longer handle this suffering.

speaker: right
text: I will likely die, but at least this will reduce the suffering of others.

speaker: left
text: I've suspected that you'd betray me.

speaker: left
text: Don't think that I haven't noticed that the Forbidden Ritual you had given was fake.

speaker: right
text: You attempted the Forbidden Ritual of Nation!?

speaker: left
text: The only reason you're still alive is because of your of your efficiency, though it seems that you'll no longer cooperate with us.

speaker: left
text: It's a shame that I'll have to kill you now, the only other person that could replace you is Break, and let's say that I'm not his biggest fan.

speaker: right
text: It's been eight painful years since you destroyed my town for the Forbidden Ritual...

speaker: right
text: For these eight years, I've lacked the courage to stop the pain, to not continue to work with you...

speaker: right
text: I should have done this earlier, but this is something I can no longer live with.

speaker: right
text: Though it will not make up for my past actions, I will do everything I can to save even one soul from this place.
(Scien grabs a young child)

speaker: left
text: What do you think you're doing!?

speaker: right
text: If he stays here, he will die in three days when the extraction finishes. With this, he will have a chance of surival.

speaker: none
text: (Scien activates a device)

speaker: left
text: BREAK! DEACTIVATE THE DEVICE!

speaker: right
text: The device seems to be malfunctioning...

speaker: left
text: Wait, does that mean...

speaker: left
text: You fool! There's no way you'll survive with a broken teleporter! Who knows where it'll take you.

speaker: left
text: You'll probably starve in the middle of the ocean.

speaker: right
text: If so, I will accept that fate as punishment.
(The teleporter activates and Scien disappears with the child)

speaker: left
text: They got away, what a waste of resources...
[1298 AN, 19 years later] [Static Castle, The Territories of Bipole]
???: *knock* *knock* *knock*
???: Who is it?
???: Greeetings, Quest.

speaker: left
text: I am Proton Xurr of the Knights of Static.

speaker: right
text: Ah, the Nolavillian Knight.

speaker: left
text: Xuir, actually.

speaker: right
text: My apologies.

speaker: right
text: Anyway, why are you here?

speaker: left
text: There is a large band of bandits, known as the Guild of Retool, who have threatened the allied territory of Sine with an attack.

speaker: left
text: The King has request us, as well as the head of the knights, Sir Scien, to assist Sine against the forces.

speaker: right
text: I would decline, but I suppose this is an order from the King.

speaker: right
text: *sigh*

speaker: right
text: I'll meet you at the front gates in an hour, is that alright?

speaker: left
text: Yes, we will await you there.
[1 hour later...]

speaker: left
text: So you finally arrive...

speaker: left
text: Shall we get going?

speaker: right
text: Actually, there's this knight who has offered to aid us...
???: Hello, I'm Romra!

speaker: left
text: I'm a newly certified knight, and I wish to one day join the Static Elemental Offense Squad.

speaker: left
text: Of course, I'll need all of the training I can get to do so.

speaker: left
text: If you would allow it, I would like to partake in this mission along side you.

false.text: Romra: Oh, sorry for bothering you.

speaker: left
text: Let's get going.
